marginalia.translation: He understands the circle of the position of the planets.

marginalia.anchor_text: dies in hebdomada, & sunt pauciores sex figurae, & plures octo, & mediocres septem

position.marginalia_text: Intelligit de numero figuraru[m] erige[n]daru[m] in vna hebdomada.

marginalia.translation: He understands about the number of figures to be raised in one week.

position.marginalia_text: [L.] Intelligit raptu[m] coeli diurnu[m] ad certa primi ca[e]li loca vt ip[s]emet in fine pr[a]ecendentis pagin[a]e exponit.

marginalia.translation: [?] He understands the daily plunder of the heaven towards certain places of the 'first heaven' (primum caelum), as he himself explains at the end of the preceding pages.

marginalia.anchor_text: Igitur figura geniturae principaliter ostendit primi anni nutritionem, & reuolutio anni ostendit principaliter de primo mense, & ita de alijs
aliquid q[u]od in figura demonstretur frustrari possit?

position.marginalia_text: De Natiuitatis significatis an possint frustrari

marginalia.translation: On the indications of a nativity [and] whether they can be frustrated.

position.marginalia_text: No[n] o[mn]nia promissa in natiuitate effectum co[n]sequi

marginalia.translation: Not all promisses in a nativity achieve an effect.

underline.text: Igitur figura geniturae principaliter ostendit primi anni nutritionem, & reuolutio anni ostendit principaliter de primo mense, & ita de alijs
constat enim in pueris cito morituris, etiam significatores filiorum, & nuptiarum

mark.name: bracket
mark.text: constat enim in pueris cito morituris, etiam significatores filiorum, & nuptiarum, & exercitij adesse, no[n] tame[n], quonia[m] more praeueniu[n]tur, aliquid horum assequi possunt
